title: Navigate forwards into a region landmark in reading mode
task: Navigate forwards into a region landmark
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the region landmark
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Top' link.

assertion4: Name 'Top' is conveyed
